math.ml

Advanced mathematical functions, functions on Numbers

Definitions

Trig

sin : Number -> Number

cos : Number -> Number

tan : Number -> Number

pi : Number

Misc.

pow : Number -> Number -> Number

round : Number -> Number -> Number

ln : Number -> Number

fac : Number -> Number

exp : Number -> Number

min : Number -> Number -> Number

max : Number -> Number -> Number

Predicates / Checking properties of numbers

mod : Number -> Number -> Number

divisible : Number -> Number -> Bool

odd : Number -> Bool

even : Number -> Bool

Random

noise : Vec -> Number
